name: Colgan Air Services
about: Colgan Air Services, established in June 1989 as Professional Flight Training in La Crosse, Wisconsin, has evolved into Western Wisconsin's premier Fixed Base Operator (FBO). Owned by Tim and Debra Colgan since October 1992, the facility offers comprehensive aviation services. For future pilots, Colgan Air Services provides ground school and flight training, including Private Pilot Certificate, Commercial Pilot Certificate, and Flight Instructor programs, with certified instructors and two Cessna 172s available for rental. The school adheres strictly to FAA regulations, ensuring safety and quality. Additional services include aircraft maintenance, storage, and management, along with concierge services for passengers and executives. With a focus on superior customer service, flexible scheduling, and a comfortable lounge area, Colgan Air Services delivers a first-class aviation experience. Safety and customer satisfaction are our top priorities.
